thi-ap17:5.3: Tahiṃ kate → tahiṃyeva (sya1ed, sya2ed) | tahiṃ setapure (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap17:24.1: vajantiyo → vajantiṃ taṃ (bj) | vajantī taṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | vajantīnaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap17:39.3: Anindito → anindiyo (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | ānandiyo (sya1ed, sya2ed), dhammakāyo → dhammatanu (si, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
thi-ap17:93.2: merumūlanadantare → merumandāradaddare (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | meruṃ mandāradaddare (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap17:105.2: dhammameghaṃ anāsavaṃ → dhammameghamanāsavaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | dhammameghaṃ pavassayaṃ (mr)
thi-ap17:105.4: raṃsijālasamujjalaṃ → raṃsimālākulaṃ jinaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | raṃsijālākulaṃ jinaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap17:113.1: Taṃ sutvāna pamoditvā → taṃ sutvāna pamuditā (bj) | taṃ sutvāhaṃ pamuditā (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap17:120.1: hutvāva sabbāyo → katvā pañcasatakuṭī (bj) | katvā pañcasataṃ kuṭiṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | pūgā bhavitvā sabbāyo (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap17:124.1: Mama puttobhinikkhamma → sa me putto ... (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap17:128.4: kammaññassa susikkhito → puññakammesu sikkhitā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | kammaññassa susikkito (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap17:137.1: Atthe dhamme ca nerutte → atthe ca dhamme nerutte (bj)
thi-ap17:141.3: Anusaṃyāyī so → anusaṃsāvayi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | anusaṃyāyi so (pts-vp-pli1ed) | anusaṃsāvayī (mr), vīro → dhīro (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap17:181.1: Buddho buddhassa nibbāne → na buddho buddhanibbāne (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap17:188.1: Aho acchariyaṃ mayhaṃ → ānanda passa buddhassa (sya1ed, sya2ed)
